data.actual_result: The invite link is spammed in the DMs (only seen by the user who created the server)
data.expected_result: Bob receives the invite once as a private message (that or Bob shouldn't be on the "Invite Your Friends" list at all)
data.short_description: Invite message spam in DMs after turning off msgs from players in server and inviting them to a server you created (part of experiment 2017-11_friend-invite-guild-create)
data.steps_to_repro: - Set "Allow direct messages from server members." in User Settings to true - Message someone who shares a common server with you but is not your friend (we're going to call them Bob) - Set "Allow direct messages from server members." in User Settings to false  - Create a new server - Be a part of the experiment 2017-11_friend-invite-guild-create that only a fraction of discord users are a part of - Under the "Invite Your Friends" menu that pops up click on "Invite" next to Bob's username
